languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} deals 5 or more {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to an enemy with a single attack, the Assassin gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.
languages.original_text: Нанеся противнику 5 или более {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} за одну атаку, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасин{/g} получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}летальности{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Assassin deals 5 or more direct damage to an enemy with a single attack, the Assassin gains +5 lethality until the end of combat. Stacks.
Whenever the Assassin deals 5 or more direct damage to an enemy with a single attack, the Assassin gains +5 lethality until the end of combat. Stacks.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} deals 5 or more {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to an enemy with a single attack, the Assassin gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

Whenever the Assassin deals 5 or more direct {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to an enemy with a single {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, the Assassin gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} deals 5 or more {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to an enemy with a single attack, the Assassin gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

languages.text: Нанеся противнику 5 или более {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} за одну атаку, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасин{/g} получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}летальности{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} deals 5 or more {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to an enemy with a single attack, the Assassin gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Нанеся противнику 5 или более прямого урона за одну атаку, ассасин получает +5 к летальности до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.
Нанеся противнику 5 или более прямого урона за одну атаку, ассасин получает +5 к летальности до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}的单次攻击对敌人造成至少5点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}时，都会获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致命{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} deals 5 or more {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to an enemy with a single attack, the Assassin gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当刺客的单次攻击对敌人造成至少5点直击伤害时，都会获得+5致命，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} inflija al menos 5 de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} a un enemigo con un único ataque, gana +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}letalidad{/g} hasta el final del combate. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} deals 5 or more {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to an enemy with a single attack, the Assassin gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el asesino inflija al menos 5 de daño directo a un enemigo con un único ataque, gana +5 de letalidad hasta el final del combate. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassine{/g} einem Gegner mit einem einzigen Angriff 5 oder mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} zufügt, erhält der Assassine bis zum Ende des Kampfes +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Letalität{/g}. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} deals 5 or more {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to an enemy with a single attack, the Assassin gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Assassine einem Gegner mit einem einzigen Angriff 5 oder mehr direkten Schaden zufügt, erhält der Assassine bis zum Ende des Kampfes +5 Lethalität. Wird aufaddiert.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassin{/g} inflige au moins 5 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} à un ennemi au cours d'une attaque ponctuelle, il gagne +10 points de {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}létalité{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} deals 5 or more {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to an enemy with a single attack, the Assassin gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'Assassin inflige au moins 5 points de dégâts directs à un ennemi au cours d'une attaque ponctuelle, il gagne +5 points de létalité jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}が1回の攻撃で敵1体に5以上の{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を与えた時、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致死率{/g}が+10される。この効果は累積する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} deals 5 or more {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to an enemy with a single attack, the Assassin gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: アサシンが1回の攻撃で敵1体に5以上の直接ダメージを与えた時、戦闘終了まで致死率が+5される。この効果は累積する。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Suikastçı{/g}, tek saldırıyla bir düşmana 5 veya daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasar{/g} verdiğinde +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}öldürücülük{/g} kazanır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} deals 5 or more {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to an enemy with a single attack, the Assassin gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.
